tool_description: Updates an existing reading session with time spent, pages read, and completion status.

session_id.description: Unique identifier of the reading session to update

ending_page.description: Page number where the session ended (must be >= starting page)

session_end_time.description: End time of the reading session

error_messages: Session not found: No reading session exists with the provided session_id.
Invalid ending page: ending_page must be >= starting_page from the original session.
Invalid session duration: session_end_time must be after session_start_time.
Session already completed: This reading session has already been marked as completed.
Invalid quality rating: reading_quality must be an integer between 1 and 5.
usage: Provide session_id, ending_page, and session_end_time to update session progress. Optionally rate reading_quality from 1-5 for session assessment.

pages_read.description: Number of pages read during this session

minutes_spent.description: Total minutes spent reading in this session

reading_speed.description: Pages per minute reading speed for this session

progress_percent.description: Updated reading progress as percentage of total book
